title: Bug 6125JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the 'Finish' button, the JAR packager reports an error: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: The JAR packager reports a failure to create the JAR file and specifically mentions 'Unsaved Editors'5'.
EB: The JAR packager should successfully create the JAR file without any errors, regardless of the editors' save status.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Edit a file without saving. 2. Open the JAR packager for the corresponding project. 3. Enter all the required information such as path, destination, name of the JAR packager description, etc. 4. Press the 'Finish' button.
